alert.note: Alert for Lassen (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 17 at 12:56PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by runoff from previous excessive rainfall and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northeast California, including the following county, Lassen. * WHEN...Until 100 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas along the Pit River and into Big Valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1253 PM PDT, The Pit River near Canby has crested and is trending down, however, water will continue to work downstream into Big Valley through this weekend. Additional contributions from local creeks may compound flooding issues in Big Valley. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nubieber, Bieber. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
